error.unexpectedRemove: An unexpected error occurred while removing the key.
error.unexpectedSave: An unexpected error occurred while saving.
error.unexpectedLoad: An unexpected error occurred while loading.

common.confirmReload: Are you sure you want to reload the page? Any unsaved changes might be lost.

errors.needCookies: YouTube asked for a human check. Retry using your browser cookies.
errors.unexpectedRemove: An unexpected error occurred while removing the key.
errors.unexpectedSave: An unexpected error occurred while saving.
errors.unexpectedLoad: An unexpected error occurred while loading.

input.cookieHelp: Tip: Be signed into YouTube in the selected browser. If you see a consent screen, visit youtube.com once in that browser and accept, then retry here.
input.cookieAdvice: Make sure the selected browser is the one you're logged into YouTube on.
input.localFileDescription: Upload a video or audio file from your computer
input.webDescription: Paste YouTube, TikTok, Instagram video links, or direct video file URLs from web pages
input.featuresUnlockAfterTranscription: Translation and other menus will appear after transcription completes.

subtitles.voiceCloningRequiresTranslation: Voice cloning requires a target language
subtitles.cancel_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel the subtitle translation process? Any progress will be lost and you'll need to start again.

summary.title: Transcript Summary
summary.ctaHelper: Generate an in-depth overview. Long videos may take a moment to process.
summary.placeholder: Your AI summary will appear here once generated.
summary.insufficientCredits: Not enough credits to run the summary.
summary.noHighlights: No highlights yet. Generate to detect punchlines.
summary.noVideoForHighlights: Open the source video to cut highlight clips.

item.insertTitle: Insert new subtitle block after this one
item.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this subtitle block? This action cannot be undone.

header.saveAsTooltip: Save As first to enable direct save

settings.title: Settings
settings.creditsDescription: Buy credits. The hours shown are an estimate of the total video duration you can transcribe or translate. Example: transcribing and translating a 3‑hour video uses about 6 hours (≈140,000 credits).

qualityTranscription.label: Quality Transcription
qualityTranscription.help: On: sequential, uses prior-line context. Off: faster batched mode.

qualityTranslation.label: Quality Translation
qualityTranslation.help: On: includes review phase (~5× more credits/time). Off: skip review.
qualityTranslation.helpWithEstimate: Review phase uses ~5× more credits. Your credits: ~{{normalTime}} normal, ~{{hqTime}} HQ.

qualitySummary.label: Quality Summary
qualitySummary.help: On: deep analysis + highlight clips with Claude Opus (~4× credits). Off: fast with GPT-5.1.
qualitySummary.helpWithEstimate: Deep analysis + highlight clips (~4× credits). Your credits: ~{{normalTime}} normal, ~{{hqTime}} HQ.

qualityDubbing.label: Quality Dubbing
qualityDubbing.help: On: ElevenLabs TTS (premium voices, ~13× credits). Off: OpenAI TTS (good quality).
qualityDubbing.helpWithEstimate: ElevenLabs TTS (~13× credits). Your credits: ~{{normalTime}} normal, ~{{hqTime}} HQ.

dubbing.voiceHelp: Choose the default voice used when generating dubbed audio.
dubbing.mixLabel: Dubbing Volume vs Original Video Volume
dubbing.mixHelp: Control how much of the original soundtrack plays underneath the dubbed voice.
dubbing.voiceCloningDesc: Preserve the original speaker's voice in dubbed audio
dubbing.voiceCloningInsufficientCredits: Requires at least 1 minute of credits
dubbing.voiceCloningEnabled: Voice cloning is enabled with ElevenLabs. The original speaker's voice will be preserved in the dubbed audio.
dubbing.voiceCloningInfo: Voice cloning uses ElevenLabs Dubbing API to analyze and recreate the original speaker's voice.

byoOpenAi.title: Bring Your Own API Keys
byoOpenAi.description: Unlock a one-time upgrade to use your own API keys. Once unlocked, any transcription, translation, dubbing, or summary runs directly on your accounts instead of consuming Stage5 credits.
byoOpenAi.unlockHint: Once unlocked, add your API keys here at any time to toggle direct billing on your accounts.
byoOpenAi.unlockedDescription: Enter your OpenAI API key below. Transcription, translation, and dubbing will run directly against your OpenAI account when a key is present.
byoOpenAi.toggleHelp: When off, AI Credits are used.
byoOpenAi.toggleOn: Using your OpenAI key for AI tasks.
byoOpenAi.toggleOff: Using Stage5 credits for AI tasks.
byoOpenAi.howToGetKeys: How do I get API keys?

openai.description: OpenAI powers transcription (Whisper), translation (GPT), and text-to-speech dubbing.
openai.step2: Sign up or log in to your account
openai.step5: Add a payment method in Billing settings (required to use the API)
openai.step6: Copy the key (starts with sk-) and paste it in Stage5
openai.note: Tip: New OpenAI accounts often get free credits to start. You only pay for what you use.

anthropic.description: Claude provides higher-quality translation reviews. Without it, GPT handles all translation tasks.
anthropic.step2: Sign up or log in to your account
anthropic.step5: Add a payment method in Plans & Billing (required to use the API)
anthropic.step6: Copy the key (starts with sk-ant-) and paste it in Stage5
anthropic.note: Tip: Anthropic offers pay-as-you-go pricing. You only pay for what you use.

elevenlabs.description: ElevenLabs offers premium transcription and voice-cloning dubbing. Without it, OpenAI handles these tasks.
elevenlabs.step2: Sign up or log in to your account
elevenlabs.step3: Click your profile icon and select
elevenlabs.step4: Copy your API key and paste it in Stage5
elevenlabs.note: Tip: ElevenLabs has a free tier with limited usage. For more, upgrade to a paid plan in your account settings.

byoAnthropic.title: Anthropic API Key (Optional)
byoAnthropic.description: Add your Anthropic API key to use Claude models directly for the translation review phase. Without this key, translations will use GPT with enhanced reasoning instead.
byoAnthropic.toggleHelp: When off, Claude requests use Stage5 credits.
byoAnthropic.toggleOn: Using your Anthropic key for Claude models.
byoAnthropic.toggleOff: Using Stage5 credits for Claude models.

stage5TtsProvider.label: TTS Quality (Stage5 Credits)
stage5TtsProvider.openaiHintWithBalance: Good quality · Your balance: {{time}} of dubbing
stage5TtsProvider.elevenlabsHintWithBalance: Best quality · Your balance: {{time}} of dubbing

credits.title: AI Credits
credits.notEnough: Insufficient credits. Please purchase more credits to continue.

creditWarning.message: Purchase credits in <settingsLink>{{settingsLinkText}}</settingsLink> to use translation and transcription features.

validation.processingDuration: Video duration is being processed. Please try again shortly.
validation.icloudPlaceholder: This file is stored in iCloud. In Finder, click 'Download' and wait for the cloud icon to finish, then try again.
validation.insufficientCreditsForVoiceCloning: Insufficient credits for voice cloning. Video is {{duration}} min but you can only afford {{affordable}} min. Please add credits or disable voice cloning.
validation.fileTooLargeForVoiceCloning: Video file is too large for voice cloning ({{size}}MB). Maximum allowed is {{max}}MB. Please use a shorter video or disable voice cloning.

unsavedSrtOnTranscribe.title: Save current subtitles before transcribing?
unsavedSrtOnTranscribe.message: You already have subtitles mounted. Transcribing will replace them. What would you like to do?

dialogs.cancelTranslationConfirm: Cancel translation? Progress will be lost and you'll need to start again.
dialogs.cancelDubbingConfirm: Cancel dubbing? Progress will be lost and you'll need to start again.
dialogs.cancelDownloadConfirm: Cancel download? Progress will be lost and you'll need to start again.

slowProcessingBanner.title: Processing is taking longer than usual.
slowProcessingBanner.description: This might be due to high demand or issues with OpenAI's servers. The process is still running in the background.

slowDownloadBanner.title: Download is taking longer than usual.
slowDownloadBanner.description: This may be due to video platform changes or new protection measures. You may need to wait for the next app version to handle newer videos.

creditRanOut.title: Credits ran out
creditRanOut.message: Your AI credits have run out. Recharge in Settings, then resume where you left off.

logs.title: Recent Logs
logs.emailBodyPrefix:
Hi,

Please find my recent logs below to help debug the issue.
